taskdescription:
Synopsis:  Utility that counts rows of data in a file. \
\
Input param:  \
filename = File name to count rows.  MAKE SURE that the file is readable by the web server user\
\
Output param:  status\
Output values:  <integer value of rows>, <error, something like Cannot read...>\
\
Sample Params Config (fill in over on the left): \
{\
"filename":"/var/www/html/nochero/tmp/files/cooloutput.txt"\
}
